* Deadline class is an extension of task, it stores an additional attribute, the deadline of
* a task. Moreover, it also modifies the string representation of a deadline task.
* Event class is an extension of task, it stores an additional attribute, the time of
* a task. Moreover, it also modifies the string representation of a event task.
* Task is the abstract class base for all task subclasses which store the total
* number of tasks, the description of the task and if the task is done. The class
* can also generate the formatted overall information about a task object.
* Todo class is an extension of Task class, modify the string representation of an Todo task.
